questions.question: What is the main reason why blockchain is famous?
options: A) Option 1
B) It provides you a feature of trust
C) Option 3
D) Immutability

questions.question: Do we need a technical background to get into blockchain?
options: A) Yes, we need technical people who can work on blockchain
B) No, we don't need technical knowledge
C) Maybe, it depends on what you know
D) Option 4

questions.question: What are the prerequisites for blockchain?
options: A) Cryptography and distributed computing
B) Programming and machine learning
C) Business and marketing
D) Option 4

questions.question: What is the purpose of a consistent naming convention in web development?
options: A) To make code look more appealing
B) To improve readability and maintainability
C) To reduce errors and bugs
D) To increase performance

questions.question: What is the best practice for handling errors in web development?
options: A) By ignoring them
B) By logging them and displaying a generic error message
C) By displaying a user-friendly error message
D) By throwing an exception

questions.question: What is the importance of code reviews in web development?
options: A) They can improve coding skills quickly
B) They can reduce errors and bugs
C) They can increase productivity
D) They can improve team collaboration

questions.question: What is the purpose of a Content Security Policy (CSP) in web development?
options: A) To improve page load times
B) To reduce errors and bugs
C) To prevent cross-site scripting attacks
D) To increase user engagement

questions.question: What is the best practice for handling sensitive data in web development?
options: A) By storing it in plain text
B) By encrypting it and storing the key securely
C) By hashing it and storing the hash value
D) By using a password manager

questions.question: What is the importance of testing in web development?
options: A) It can improve coding skills quickly
B) It can reduce errors and bugs
C) It can increase productivity
D) It can ensure the website works as expected

questions.question: What is the purpose of a security audit in web development?
options: A) To improve coding skills quickly
B) To identify vulnerabilities and weaknesses
C) To increase productivity
D) To reduce errors and bugs
